metadata.feature_description: Provides comprehensive file management including rename, delete, copy, move operations with permission validation

steps.action: Navigate to Assets panel and hover over test_upload_file.txt
steps.expected: File action icons should appear on hover
steps.actual: File action icons appeared on hover including edit, move, copy, download, delete

steps.action: Click edit button to open file details panel
steps.expected: File details panel should open with editable name field
steps.actual: File details panel opened with Name field containing current filename

steps.action: Change filename to 'renamed_test_file.txt' and click Save
steps.expected: File should be renamed successfully
steps.actual: File was renamed successfully to 'renamed_test_file.txt'

steps.action: Open file details panel and enter 'invalid:file?.txt' as new name
steps.expected: System should display validation error for invalid characters
steps.actual: Entered filename with invalid characters ':' and '?'

steps.action: Click Save to trigger validation
steps.expected: Error message should indicate invalid characters
steps.actual: Error displayed: 'The name contains invalid character(s). Please specify a name without \:/*?"<>|.'

steps.action: Enter 'CON.txt' as new filename (Windows reserved name)
steps.expected: System should display validation error for reserved names
steps.actual: Entered reserved filename 'CON.txt'

steps.action: Click Save to trigger validation
steps.expected: Error message should indicate reserved name
steps.actual: Error displayed: 'The name is reserved. Try a different name.'

steps.action: Hover over renamed_test_file.txt and click delete button
steps.expected: Delete confirmation dialog should appear
steps.actual: Delete confirmation dialog appeared asking 'Are you sure you want to delete this file?'

steps.action: Click Delete to confirm
steps.expected: File should be deleted from the folder
steps.actual: File was successfully deleted, no longer visible in folder listing

steps.action: Hover over test_image.png and click copy button
steps.expected: Copy dialog should open with folder selection tree
steps.actual: Copy dialog opened showing 'Copy file to (select a destination)' with folder tree

steps.action: Select Images folder as destination
steps.expected: Images folder should be highlighted as selected
steps.actual: Images folder was selected and highlighted

steps.action: Click Copy button to execute copy operation
steps.expected: File should be copied to Images folder
steps.actual: File was successfully copied to Images folder, verified by navigating to Images folder

steps.action: Hover over test_image.png in Home folder and click move button
steps.expected: Move dialog should open with folder selection tree
steps.actual: Move dialog opened showing 'Move file to (select a destination)' with folder tree

steps.action: Select Badges folder as destination
steps.expected: Badges folder should be highlighted as selected
steps.actual: Badges folder was selected and highlighted

steps.action: Click Move button to execute move operation
steps.expected: File should be moved to Badges folder (removed from source, present in destination)
steps.actual: File was moved - no longer in Home folder

steps.action: Navigate to Badges folder to verify file was moved
steps.expected: test_image.png should be present in Badges folder
steps.actual: test_image.png is now present in Badges folder, confirming successful move

steps.action: In Images folder, attempt to copy test_image.png to the same Images folder
steps.expected: Copy dialog should open
steps.actual: Copy dialog opened with folder tree

steps.action: Select Images folder as destination (same folder where file exists)
steps.expected: Images folder should be selected
steps.actual: Images folder selected as destination

steps.action: Click Copy to execute copy with naming conflict
steps.expected: System should handle the conflict by appending suffix to filename
steps.actual: System automatically created 'test_image-Copy.png' - appended '-Copy' suffix to resolve naming conflict

steps.action: Open file details panel for test_image-Copy.png
steps.expected: File details panel should open with editable fields
steps.actual: File details panel opened with Name field containing 'test_image-Copy.png'

steps.action: Clear the Name field to make it empty
steps.expected: Name field should be emptied
steps.actual: Name field was cleared and is now empty

steps.action: Click Save to trigger validation
steps.expected: Validation error should appear indicating name is required
steps.actual: Validation error displayed: 'Text is required'

observations: File action icons (edit, move, copy, download, delete) only appear on hover over file cards
The system validates against Windows reserved filenames (CON, PRN, AUX, NUL, COM1-9, LPT1-9, CLOCK$)
When copying a file to a location where a file with the same name exists, the system automatically appends '-Copy' suffix to resolve the conflict
The Name field in file details is marked as required with an asterisk (*)
Delete operation requires confirmation via a dialog before executing
Move operation removes the file from the source folder and places it in the destination folder
Copy operation creates a duplicate in the destination folder while keeping the original
